ceo.title: Message from CEO
ceo.name: Jan Kowalski
ceo.message: At Xapika, we believe in the power of partnership and innovation. Our team of dedicated professionals works tirelessly to ensure that every railway vehicle we service meets the highest standards of safety and performance. Together with our clients and partners, we are shaping the future of railway transportation.
